sentences.en: Accuracy is not always compatible with haste.
Had the assumption been strictly compatible, the results would have been identical.
sentences.cn: 如果所作假定完全相同, 则结果也应一致.

sentences.en: Health and hard work are compatible.
sentences.cn: 健康与努力工作是一致的.

sentences.en: It must be compatible with his personality and style.
sentences.cn: 它必须适合于他的个性和作风.

sentences.en: Marriage and the life I live just don't seem compatible.
sentences.cn: 婚姻和我的生活好像就是没法兼容。

sentences.en: Mildred and I are very compatible. She's interested in the things that interest me.
sentences.cn: 我和米尔德丽德很合得来，我感兴趣的东西她也感兴趣。

sentences.en: Silane coupling agents are compatible with almost every type of organic polymer.
sentences.cn: 硅烷偶联剂几乎对每一种类型的有机聚合物都是合适的.

sentences.en: That is another way in which she and the President weren't compatible.
sentences.cn: 这是她和总统不和谐的另一方面.

sentences.en: The new software is IBM compatible (= can be used with IBM computers ) .
sentences.cn: 这个新软件与IBM的计算机兼容。

sentences.en: The new system will be compatible with existing equipment.
sentences.cn: 新的系统将与现有的设备相互兼容。

sentences.en: Their objectives were compatible with the interests of North American investors.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标符合北美投资者的利益.

sentences.en: These chromosome aberrations are all stable, compatible with cell viability.
sentences.cn: 这些染色体畸变都是稳定的, 不影响细胞生活力的.

sentences.en: Truth telling is not compatible with the defense of the realm.
sentences.cn: 宣告真理与保卫这个王国是不相符合的两件事.

sentences.en: We return again to the search for a compatible element.
sentences.cn: 我们回过头来再去寻找相容的元素.

sentences.en: You should choose a roommate more compatible to your tastes.
sentences.cn: 你应该挑个和你意气更相投的人同住一室.

words.tran_cn: 适合地；协调地；相互兼容地

phrases.tran_cn: adj. 与……和谐相处；与……相配的

trans.tran_cn: 兼容的，可共存的，和睦相处的
trans.tran_en: if two pieces of computer equipment are compatible, they can be used together, especially when they are made by different companies
